  • title: Dark Mode icon: ğŸŒ™ details: Full dark-mode support; follows system preference or can be toggled manually

  • title: OKlab Gamut icon: ğŸŒˆ details: Gradients powered by the OKlab color space, ensuring hue-linear transitions and consistent contrast at any brightness

  • title: Responsive Layout icon: ğŸ“± details: Grid + Flex box with breakpoint-based adaptation; every component is fully responsive

  • title: Tree-shaking icon: ğŸ§© details: Each component is individually exported; unused code is automatically eliminated
